subject: Tennis
Suits and Litigation
Decisions and Verdicts
lead_paragraph: A federal appeals court upheld an earlier ruling that the ATP Tour did not violate antitrust statutes when it reorganized its tour schedule and tennis events to better promote the sport.
snippet: A federal appeals court upheld an earlier ruling that the ATP Tour did not violate antitrust statutes when it reorganized its tour schedule and tennis events to better promote the sport.
